attributes.action: Government to offer or require school children resit the current academic year
attributes.additional_details:
This has impacted on everyone’s lives and loads of children have missed out on education and qualifications.
It would also help others mental health
attributes.background: To make everyone resit the previous or current academic year due to coronavirus and for people who have left school and colleges without qualifications get another year to try again

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Allow more school pupils to repeat an academic year due to COVID-19 lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/326223

All pupils to repeat this current academic year: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566160
